goodBadTouch.title: Understanding Touch
slides: Some touches make us feel safe and loved, like hugs from family members.
Some touches make us feel uncomfortable or confused. It's important to recognize these feelings.
You have the right to say NO to any touch that makes you feel uncomfortable.
If anyone touches you in a way that makes you feel bad, tell a trusted adult right away.

safeAdults.title: Safe Adults
slides: Safe adults are people we can trust to help us when we need it.
Safe adults listen to our concerns and respect our boundaries.
Safe adults don't ask us to keep secrets that make us feel uncomfortable.
Examples of safe adults might include parents, teachers, school counselors, and police officers.
